name: We Do Not Sow
description:
We Do Not Sow is a Viking pirate simulation.

Fire cannon/  leash your pirates / collect resources/ upgrade your ship. 

Do not fall off in the end of the world.

=======================================

Controls:

- WASD: Move Ship
- LMB: Fire Rock
- RMB:Release a Pirate
- Pirate take action on it's own will
- Middle Mouse Click On A pirate To call it back 
- Press and hold Space To Collcet nearby resources

=======================================

It's also a game made in a week for Weekly Game Jam (no pre-made asset accept for the bgm).  Here's the link.

If you guys like the idea, i would love to polish it further.
